channel.title: Posts on Sharif Islam
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sharif Islam

item.title: Ethics in Artificial Intelligence (AI)
item.description: AI and Misinformation A man used AI to bring back his deceased fiancé. But the creators of the tech warn it could be dangerous and used to spread misinformation.

item.title: Spreading Misinformation
item.description: Spreading of Misinformation Just 12 people are responsible for the majority of COVID-19 conspiracy theories online, study finds. JFK’s anti-vaxxer nephew is one of the ‘disinformation dozen.’

item.title: Summary Statistics Using tidyverse
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.5 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.4 v dplyr 1.0.7 ## v tidyr 1.1.4 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 2.1.1 v forcats 0.5.1 ## -- Conflicts ---------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() For illustration purpose, mtcars dataset is being used. To create summary statistics, summarise_each function is used along with funsfunction.

item.title: Logistic Regression in R
item.description: Pacakges Needed to Run Logistic Regression # Loading packages pacman::p_load( tidyverse, stargazer, lmtest, sandwich )

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
item.description: Introduction Now a days, data science or data analytics has become a buzzword.The emergence of social media and some other platforms like social media have given birth to vast amount of data. The Economist 1 reports that “the world’s most valuable resource is no longer oil, but data.” Data is the raw materials for gaining addtional insights and the data analytics is the means through which the insights are extracted from the data.
